alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 5:01AM CDT until July 27 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Box Butte County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southern Dawes County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 445 AM MDT. * At 400 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Box Butte Campground, or 28 miles southwest of Chadron, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Box Butte Campground, Box Butte Dam and Marsland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
